title: Hide WhatsApp number, integrate UPI ID into all payment flows (hidden)

requirements.text: In the FloatingWhatsAppButton component, keep the WhatsApp button visible and functional, but remove/hide the displayed phone number text from the button UI so only the WhatsApp icon and label remain visible (no number shown to users). The wa.me link should still work by using the hardcoded number internally without rendering it.

quotes: Yaha pe bss whatsapp button rahne mera number hide kardo

acceptanceCriteria: FloatingWhatsAppButton is visible on the page
No phone number text is rendered in the button or its tooltip
Clicking the button still opens WhatsApp with the correct number via wa.me link
The selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/a[1]/span[1] (the number span) is hidden or its text content is removed

requirements.text: Integrate the UPI ID `7970705775@ybl` as the default/hardcoded UPI ID into all payment flows (PaymentGateway, PaymentModal, PricingSection, VideoEditingSection, WebDesignPaymentModal, WebDesignServicesPromo, and any other component that handles UPI/PhonePe payment). The UPI ID must NOT be displayed or rendered anywhere in the UI — it should only be used internally (e.g., embedded in a UPI deep link or QR code generation) so users can complete payments without seeing the raw UPI ID string.

quotes: ye mera upi id 7970705775@ybl h isko payment wale sab me integrate kardo or ye hide ho bss sab payment kar sake aisa bana

acceptanceCriteria: UPI ID 7970705775@ybl is used in all payment components as the recipient UPI address
The UPI ID string is never rendered as visible text in any payment UI
Payment flows (PaymentGateway, PaymentModal, PricingSection, VideoEditingSection, WebDesignPaymentModal) function correctly with this UPI ID
QR code or UPI deep link (upi://pay?pa=7970705775@ybl) is generated/used where applicable so users can pay without reading the raw ID
The SiteContentManagement admin page may still store/display the UPI ID for admin use only, but it must not leak to public-facing pages

constraints: Do not remove or disable the WhatsApp floating button — only hide the phone number display
UPI ID must never appear as plain text in any user-facing component
Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Modifying admin-side views that show the UPI ID to admins
